topic.title: Application Access-Testing
topic.shortdesc: Role-Based Access Control requires applications to pass appropriate credentials, in order to perform specific operations. Using the Couchbase Web Console, in combination with N1QL queries executed by means of the cbq tool, you can run RBAC tests; and thereby make sure that your applications have been assigned the correct roles.

section.title: Test Applications' Access-Privileges
section.p: You can test in three stages:

ol.li: Create a bucket containing documents, different levels of access to which can be assigned to different users. This is described in the section Create and Populate a Bucket.
Create users with different role-combinations. See Create Users and Assign Roles.
Use the cbq tool to test bucket-access, according to the roles you have assigned to users. See Perform cbq Access Tests.
